alert.note: Alert for Addison; Orange; Washington (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 3:44PM EDT until July 21 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Orange County in central Vermont... East central Addison County in central Vermont... Southwestern Washington County in central Vermont... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 344 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Warren, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Barre, Montpelier, Barre Town, Northfield Village, Warren, Northfield, Websterville, East Montpelier, Waitsfield, Barre City, Berlin, Roxbury, Williamstown, E F Knapp State Airport, Granville, Washington, Moretown, Lincoln, Brookfield, and Fayston. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
